name: RE:RN Chat - Chat Focus
description: Removes everything in the RE:RN chat window and centers the chat in a nice dark black background. ... Well, almost. Still can't figure out how to block the blue Invisionfree thingy. For now I just used Adblock Plus Element Hiding Helper, lol.
additional_info: 0.9 - Experimental release, lolwhatever. No Invisionfree ad block as of now. (Screenshot has no IF ad because of me using Adblock Plus Element Hiding Helper)
